name: FOREVER STRAIGHT
description:
The Forever Straight is a soft, silky straight texture that has a slight natural wave pattern when the hair is wet. Ideal for one who enjoys bone straight hair at all times.  Considered to be the least maintains of the Brazilian hair textures.

name: EXOTIC CURL
description:
